channel.title: PI degradable items
channel.description:
Hey i was wondering if anyone knows how to remove the degrade on pvp items? my players dont seem to like it LOL
base: Hybrid pvp V3 :)

item.title: PI degradable items
item.dc:creator: @Darkmist Darkmist
item.description:
@Darkmist wrote:

darkclawz:

OMFG EVERY ONE IS SO STUPID HYBRID PVP V3 IS NOT A FUCKING 508 OR 525 OR EVEN 562 IT 317 J FRAMING UP 2 562 NOOBS LEARN HOW TO USE SERVER AND WHAT BASE THE SERVER IS BEFOR SAYING IT A 508 525 562 CUZ REALLY U DONT KNOW WHAT UR TALKING ABOUT LOL SO SHHHHH AND PLUS IF U WANNA TAKE THIS ANY HIGHER WE COULD ASK ONWER KEVIN I HAVE HIM ON ME MSN ( HE MADE THE SERVER -.- LEECHERS LEARN HOW 2 WORK FROM SCRATCH )

Ummm, fail much? Did my question say that hybrid pvp was a 508 or a 525 or a higher version? No, Does my title say PI 508 or higher? NO it just says PI, No shit its a 317 ur just fucked in the brain to even right this nonsense :\

And i found how to remove it, it has a VLS-count thing, like a killcount but in a different system You all know what i mean so yer ima remove that from the playersave.java and hope everything works out, I also removed the degrading from combat assistant thanks guys for the help

Read full topic
